items.raw_desc: Babakocsi MoMi Clara 2024, bordó:Ha azt szeretnéd, hogy te és gyermeked a lehető legjobban élvezzétek a közös sétákat, akkor a minőségi MoMi babakocsi a legjobb döntés. Ezt a sport babakocsit könnyű irányítás és kiváló menettulajdonságok jellemzik. Helyezd a gyermeket, akinek már nem okoz gondot az ülés a sportülésbe. items.raw_desc: Babahordozó Ergobaby Omni Dream Black Leopard:The ERGOBABY Omni Dream is made of 100% SoftTouch cotton, which is not only soft and pleasant to the touch, but also wear-resistant. It allows four different carrying positions, on the stomach, on the side, on the back and facing away from the wearer. In addition, it grows with the baby from birth, from approximately 3.2 kg, up to a weight of 20 kg, without the need for a newborn insert. The ergonomically shaped seat supports healthy hip, spine and pelvic development and ensures a natural M-shaped leg position. The baby's weight is evenly distributed between the shoulders and hips of the wearer, making the ERGOBABY Omni Dream significantly more comfortable even when worn for longer periods. The weight of the carrier is 900 g.
